Layer.SetCommand:
%function(self)
local pn = 0
if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(pn) then
local NotesHitScore = 0; local NotesPossibleScore = 1; local PlayerPercentageUKSRT = 0; local Selection = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSteps(pn);
NotesPossibleScore = math.max(STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(pn):GetPossibleDancePoints(),NotesPossibleScore) NotesHitScore = (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_MARVELOUS) * 5 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_PERFECT) * 4 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_GREAT) * 2 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_BOO) * -2 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_MISS) * -4 ) + (GetHoldScore(pn, HNS_OK) * 5 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_HITMINE) * -8 )
PlayerPercentageUKSRT = math.floor(10000*(NotesHitScore/NotesPossibleScore))/100
self:settext( string.format('%.2f',PlayerPercentageUKSRT)..'%' )
end
end
